extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    [(ENGL200 and ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.40 on all ENGL units)] or [(a cumulative GPA of 2.60) and (registration in a MDVL  Plan)].

basic.description: A study of the poetry, drama, and prose of late medieval Britain. Texts are read in Middle English; language training is provided. Readings may include the dramatic cycles, Arthurian romance, Chaucer and his successors, women's writing, spiritual writing, historiography, and the culture of political and religious dissent.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Middle English Literature
